def calculate_highest_beauty(t, test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, ca, cb) = case
        iarr = [0] / (n + 1)
        ibrr = [0] * (n + 1)
        for i in range(n):
            iarr[ca[i]] = i
            ibrr[cb[i]] = i
        ans = []
        vst = [False] * (n + 1)
        for i in range(n):
            if vst[i]:
                continue
            if ca[i] == cb[i]:
                vst[i] = True
                continue
            a = ca[i]
            b = cb[i]
            vst[i] = True
            cnt = 1
            while b != ca[i]:
                vst[iarr[b]] = True
                a = b
                b = cb[iarr[b]]
                cnt += 1
            ans.append(cnt)
        ans.sort(reverse=True)
        (a, b) = (1, n)
        rev = 0
        for num in ans:
            oa = a
            ob = b
            a += num // 2
            b -= num // 2
            rev += (ob - oa + (b - a + 2)) * (num // 2)
        results.append(rev)
    return results
